state_description: This screen informs the user that all software on their Mac is up to date. It is part of the application management module, specifically focusing on updating applications.
done: All Mac software is updated to the latest versions available.

enables.name: Navigate to Smart Scan
enables.description: Go to the Smart Scan module for a quick checkup of your Mac.

enables.name: Navigate to System Junk
enables.description: Go to the System Junk module to clean unnecessary files.

enables.name: Navigate to Mail Attachments
enables.description: Go to the Mail Attachments module to manage email attachments.

enables.name: Navigate to Trash Bins
enables.description: Go to the Trash Bins module to empty trash bins.

enables.name: Navigate to Malware Removal
enables.description: Go to the Malware Removal module to check for malware.

enables.name: Navigate to Privacy
enables.description: Go to the Privacy module to manage privacy settings.

enables.name: Navigate to Optimization
enables.description: Go to the Optimization module to optimize Mac performance.

enables.name: Navigate to Maintenance
enables.description: Go to the Maintenance module for system maintenance tasks.

enables.name: Navigate to Uninstaller
enables.description: Go to the Uninstaller module to uninstall applications.

enables.name: Navigate to Extensions
enables.description: Go to the Extensions module to manage browser extensions.

enables.name: Navigate to Space Lens
enables.description: Go to the Space Lens module to analyze disk space usage.

enables.name: Navigate to Large & Old Files
enables.description: Go to the Large & Old Files module to find and manage large files.

enables.name: Navigate to Shredder
enables.description: Go to the Shredder module to securely delete files.
